Package actions

Class UI_Actions

java.lang.Object
actions.UI_Actions
public class UI_Actions
extends java.lang.Object
UI_Actions: contains the main functionalities you can do or perform on a webpage such clicking on a link , scrolling down or up, dealing with web elements buttons , text fields, text areas , ...
Since:
18/6/2021

  • Constructor Details

    • UI_Actions

      public UI_Actions​(org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver driver)

  • Method Details

    • locateElement

      public org.openqa.selenium.WebElement locateElement​(java.lang.String selector, UI_Actions.Locators locator) throws java.lang.Exception
      Locate a web element by specifying its locator type and selector
      Parameters:
      selector - the string which specify the webelement on the DOM
      locator - type of locator such a xpath , cssSelector , ID, ...
      Returns:
      located webelement which you deal with such a clicking on, clearing , ...
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - if the webelement itself does not exist , or can't be located it throws new exception 'This element can't be found!'

    • locateElements

      public java.util.List<org.openqa.selenium.WebElement> locateElements​(java.lang.String selector, UI_Actions.Locators locator) throws java.lang.Exception
      locate list of webelements by specifying their locator and selector
      Parameters:
      selector - the string which specify the webelement on the DOM
      locator - type of locator such a xpath , cssSelector , ID, ...
      Returns:
      list of located webelements which you can deal with such a clicking on, clearing , ...
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - if the webelements themselves do not exist , or can't be located it throws new exception 'These elements can't be found!'

    • clickOn

      public void clickOn​(java.lang.String selector, UI_Actions.Locators locator) throws java.lang.Exception
      click on a webelement by specifying its selector and locator
      Parameters:
      selector - the string which specify the webelement on the DOM
      locator - type of locator such a xpath , cssSelector , ID, ...
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - if web element is not clickable or the webelement itself do not exist , or can't be located it throws new exception 'This element can't be found!'

    • getText

      public java.lang.String getText​(java.lang.String selector, UI_Actions.Locators locator) throws java.lang.Exception
      get the text appeared on a webelement
      Parameters:
      selector - the string which specify the webelement on the DOM
      locator - type of locator such a xpath , cssSelector , ID, ...
      Returns:
      the specified webelement text
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - if the webelement itself do not exist , or can't be located it throws new exception 'This element can't be found!'

    • setText

      public void setText​(java.lang.String selector, UI_Actions.Locators locator, java.lang.String text) throws java.lang.Exception
      write down on a webelement
      Parameters:
      selector - the string which specify the webelement on the DOM
      locator - type of locator such a xpath , cssSelector , ID, ...
      text - specify the text to fill the webelement with
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - if the webelement itself do not exist , or can't be located it throws new exception 'This element can't be found!'

    • navigateToPage

      public void navigateToPage​(java.lang.String url)
      navigate to a specific page and waiting for the presence of DOM to be ready
      Parameters:
      url - specify the page url to navigate to

    • scrollBy

      public void scrollBy​(int scrollHeight)
      scroll down by a value
      Parameters:
      scrollHeight - specify the height to scroll down

    • scrollToEnd

      public void scrollToEnd()
      scroll down till end of DOM
